name: 2002 Pokemon Expedition 39 Charizard Rev.Foil PSA 8 NM-MT (0xe40a...dcfd)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0xe40a37a5d273984ddb456861b7e071acec1847719b5aa07771d94731bc3edcfd) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
